column3: News;Siem Reap:------ An electrical transmission wire carried by poles burst into flames in Wat Damnak Village
column9: the cops together with citizens used fire extinguishers and prevented traffic from passing. The power company was informed
column10: which temporarily disconnected electricity.------The fire was out at 11:00 am without causing harm to the people.------The electricity flow at the site was temporarily closed so that officials from the Electricity of Siem Reap would check and repair the connection.
